item.description:
Ladies and Gents,

This month, we are organizing a great meetup event – a trip to New Hampshire’s White Mountains! There are many things to enjoy up in New England, but I guarantee that the White Mountains should not be missed!

Nihongo De
http://web.mit.edu/~r...

Here’s a bit more information about our trip:

Lodging
We have rented a large house up in North Conway, New Hampshire, very close to the tallest mountains in New Hampshire, and will be relaxing there from August 22-24 (Friday evening - Sunday). The housing community we will be staying at has a pool and tennis courts, so feel free to use them at your leisure. We will also prepare the daily meals for our group up at the house.

What We Will Do
We have set aside time for hiking in Franconia Notch State Park, as well as in Crawford Notch State Park and Mount Washington. The top of Mount Washington is an amazing place, and has the very famous Mount Washington Observatory. The peak can be reached by foot, by car, or by train. For those of you who want to go shopping, there are many large outlets in North Conway, and the town is a very nice place to visit.

How Do I Get There?
We will be taking four cars, and have room for 15 people. We still need two people to volunteer to take their cars (your gas will be paid for).

Cost
The total cost of the trip will be $135. This includes food, lodging, gas money, parking fees, and tickets to the parks. You can pay me in person, or you can use the Amazon link I have set up below.

What to Bring
- rain gear (rain pants, rain jacket or a good quality rain poncho)
- a warm fleece or sweatshirt (the mountains in New Hampshire are tall, so it can get very cold!)
- a large water bottle
- sunblock
- bathing suit
- toothbrush, shampoo, etc
- (optional) a sleeping bag - there will be 15 of us in the house, and most of us will have a place to sleep, but bring a sleeping bag just in case a few of us need to find a creative sleeping location.

Everything Else I Should Know
Please only agree to go if you 1) know you can make it, and 2) know you can afford the $135 fee. Since I have paid for the house myself, late cancellations will make it impossible for me to cover the costs of the trip. Also, although this should not be an issue, an active meetup member will receive acceptance priority over an inactive member. If you want to bring a guest, please e-mail me - if there's enough space, I will be happy to allow them to join us.

Useful Links
Here are links to more information about places to visit near where we will stay:

Mount Washington Observatory:
http://www.mountwashi...

Crawford Notch:
http://www.nhstatepar...
http://www.northeastw...

Franconia Notch:
http://www.nhstatepar...
http://images.google....

White Mountains Guide:
http://www.visitwhite...

North Conway:
http://www.settlersgr...

Kancamagus Highway:
http://gorp.away.com/...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be arriving earlier than the rest of you :P
item.name: ~~A Trip to New Hampshire's White Mountains ~~
